title: Swagger-viewer â€“ view your swagger specs easily
author: fatihky
content: readme.md swagger-viewer command line tool view swagger spec file. install, run npm install -g swagger-viewer. use: swagger-viewer [--open --port port --host host --] spec tool accepts both swagger spec files urls.example usage:swagger-viewer swagger.yamlswagger-viewer http://example.com/swagger.yamlswagger-viewer --open -- swagger.yaml # open documentation browserswagger-viewer --port 8888 swagger.yaml # set listen port
